allow: Bash(node -e " const { execSync } = require\(''child_process''\); const { fork } = require\(''child_process''\); const child = fork\(''./index.js'', { stdio: [''pipe'', ''pipe'', ''pipe'', ''ipc''] }\); let output = ''''; child.stdout.on\(''data'', \(d\) => { output += d.toString\(\); }\); child.stderr.on\(''data'', \(d\) => { output += ''[stderr] '' + d.toString\(\); }\); setTimeout\(\(\) => { child.kill\(\); console.log\(output\); }, 3000\); ")
